alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Holt (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 1:27PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Holt and Boyd Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 127 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles north of Stuart to near Spencer to 12 miles south of Lynch. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spencer, Butte, Lynch, Naper, Gross, Bristow, Dustin, Anoka, Monowi, Scottville, Redbird State Wildlife Management Area, Hull Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Spencer Dam, Dorsey, Parshall Bridge State Wildlife Management Area and Anncar. This includes the following highways... Highway 281 between mile markers 204 and 223. Highway 12 between mile markers 89 and 144. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
